file_content.text: Jedi. Imperials had a hidden tunnel. Reinforcements come. We do not have enough men.
You must reach the First Son. I guide my commandos to stop the enemy. We may... not survive.
You are a Mystic, not a commando. They must protect you.
Your place is not in battle.
They will fight fiercer for a Mystic. I will not stand by.
You will all die.
We are Voss. This is our duty.
Will earn place of honor for this.
Seeing "visions" is no reason to throw away a promising mind!
Don't do this. We'll find the men, just wait!
Jedi, he knows what he's doing.
Knowing speaks. This is proper.
There's still time for me to bring help.
We can come for you.
You would die with us. Find the First Son.
How will you stop them?
Bring down their walls.
You must do what you believe is right.
Then act as you must.
This heroism will not be forgotten. I promise.
You do yourself great honor.
Thank you for everything. May your Force be with you.
Grandfather. I understand.
Fortifications are impressive. We will best them.
I am ready.
